mapper.select: select id, address_id, address_seq_no, province_code, province_name, city_code, city_name, district_code, district_name, post_code, detail_address, remarks, insert_time, timestamp from comm_address where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into comm_address(address_id, address_seq_no, province_code, province_name, city_code, city_name, district_code, district_name, post_code, detail_address, remarks, insert_time, timestamp) values (#{addressId}, #{addressSeqNo}, #{provinceCode}, #{provinceName}, #{cityCode}, #{cityName}, #{districtCode}, #{districtName}, #{postCode}, #{detailAddress}, #{remarks}, #{insertTime}, #{timestamp})

insert into comm_address(address_id, address_seq_no, province_code, province_name, city_code, city_name, district_code, district_name, post_code, detail_address, remarks, insert_time, timestamp) values
(#{entity.addressId}, #{entity.addressSeqNo}, #{entity.provinceCode}, #{entity.provinceName}, #{entity.cityCode}, #{entity.cityName}, #{entity.districtCode}, #{entity.districtName}, #{entity.postCode}, #{entity.detailAddress}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.insertTime}, #{entity.timestamp})

insert into comm_address(address_id, address_seq_no, province_code, province_name, city_code, city_name, district_code, district_name, post_code, detail_address, remarks, insert_time, timestamp) values
(#{entity.addressId}, #{entity.addressSeqNo}, #{entity.provinceCode}, #{entity.provinceName}, #{entity.cityCode}, #{entity.cityName}, #{entity.districtCode}, #{entity.districtName}, #{entity.postCode}, #{entity.detailAddress}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.insertTime}, #{entity.timestamp})
on duplicate key update address_id = values(address_id), address_seq_no = values(address_seq_no), province_code = values(province_code), province_name = values(province_name), city_code = values(city_code), city_name = values(city_name), district_code = values(district_code), district_name = values(district_name), post_code = values(post_code), detail_address = values(detail_address), remarks = values(remarks), insert_time = values(insert_time), timestamp = values(timestamp)
mapper.update:
update comm_address
address_id = #{addressId},
address_seq_no = #{addressSeqNo},
province_code = #{provinceCode},
province_name = #{provinceName},
city_code = #{cityCode},
city_name = #{cityName},
district_code = #{districtCode},
district_name = #{districtName},
post_code = #{postCode},
detail_address = #{detailAddress},
remarks = #{remarks},
insert_time = #{insertTime},
timestamp = #{timestamp},
where id = #{id}
